name: The Brand Foundry.
tagline: Award winning digital marketing agency in London
description:
The Brand Foundry offers corporate and brand identity creation, logo design, corporate communications, FMCG branding and packaging, bespoke bottle design, exhibition design and organization, art direction, copywriting, website design, commercial research, commercial strategy and photography.
Some of their current clients include Elements 8, City of London Distillery, 1751 Gin Lane, GLA and St. Martins-in-the-Fields, Whisk & Pin, Angioletti Cider.
